price: 124. De Sabbat is slechts voorgeschreven aan degenen die daarover van mening verschilden en waarlijk, jullie Heer zal tussen hen op de Dag der Opstanding oordelen over datgene waarover zij van mening verschilden.
arabic: إِنَّمَا جُعِلَ ٱلسَّبۡتُ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ ٱخۡتَلَفُواْ فِيهِۚ وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَيَحۡكُمُ بَيۡنَهُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ فِيمَا كَانُواْ فِيهِ يَخۡتَلِفُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: innamā juʿila al-sabtu ʿalā alladhīna ikh'talafū fīhi wa-inna rabbaka layaḥkumu baynahum yawma al-qiyāmati fīmā kānū fīhi yakhtalifūna
